item.title: Test Post
item.description: This is a test HTML <section id="main"> <div> <h1 id="title">{{ .Title }}</h1> {{ range .Pages }} {{ .Render "summary"}} {{ end }} </div> </section> Golang package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("hello world") }
